Talent    Recruit on Campus (MBA)    Recruit on Campus (Undergraduate)      Get Started                                                     Search                                                        The NYU Stern complex at 44 West 4th Street, New York City.                     Explore Stern's broad portfolio of academic programs, from undergraduate to graduate programs and executive education. Regardless of program, academic excellence shapes the experience. Find the right fit for you.                  Programs & Admissions            Undergraduate         Program Spotlight    Undergraduate        Explore our program, which integrates business with liberal arts, social impact and a global perspective. Engage in the Stern and NYU communities while taking advantage of all New York City offers.               Full-time MBA         Program Spotlight    Full-time MBA        Choose our two-year program to change or enhance careers. Engage in an experience shaped by academic excellence, IQ + EQ, a collaborative community and the energy of NYC.               Part-time MBA Manhattan         Program Spotlight    Part-time MBA Manhattan        Earn your MBA while you work through our top-ranked Langone Part-time MBA program. Take classes on weekday evenings or on Saturdays in Manhattan. Also explore our two-year accelerated option.               Part-time MBA Westchester         Program Spotlight    Part-time MBA Westchester        Our top-ranked Langone MBA in Purchase, New York is convenient for working professionals in Westchester, Fairfield and Bergen Counties. Take classes on weekday evenings.               Executive MBA         Program Spotlight    Executive MBA        Enroll in a 22-month general management program with experienced professionals. Take classes every other Friday and Saturday in Greenwich Village. Participate in two Global Study Tours.               Dual Degrees         Program Spotlight    Dual Degrees        Stern offers dual degree programs that combine our academic excellence with the expertise of NYU's graduate schools. Pursue business with medicine, law, film production or public administration, among others.               TRIUM Global EMBA         Program Spotlight    TRIUM Global EMBA        Join senior executives from around the world in the only global executive MBA program to integrate an international socio-political and economic dimension into its business curriculum.               Global Degrees         Program Spotlight    Global Degrees        Master of Science in Risk Management Master of Science in Global Finance, joint degree in partnership with HKUST Master of Science in Business Analytics (NYU Shanghai)               PhD Program         Program Spotlight    PhD Program        Do state-of-the-art research as a scholar-in-training in a program that ranks top 5 in graduate placements at leading universities world wide. Benefit from a competitive student/faculty ratio.               Executive Education         Program Spotlight    Executive Education        Benefit from real-world faculty expertise in management, finance, marketing and innovation. Apply learnings from short, open enrollment programs or customize to achieve results for your firm.               Advanced Professional Certificates         Program Spotlight    Advanced Professional Certificates        Take five graduate business classes to obtain your certificate. Pursue one of three tracks: finance, marketing or general business.
